products.name: Yene Classic Runner
products.description: A timeless running shoe designed for both performance and style. Features our signature cushioning technology and breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort and support during your runs.

products.name: Yene Comfort Walker
products.description: Experience ultimate comfort with our premium walking shoes. Perfect for daily wear and long walks with extra cushioning and arch support for all-day comfort.

products.name: Yene Sport Elite
products.description: Professional-grade athletic shoes designed for serious athletes. Features advanced stability and support systems with responsive cushioning for optimal performance.

products.name: Yene Urban Sneaker
products.description: Stylish urban sneakers that combine fashion and comfort. Perfect for casual outings and everyday wear with premium materials and modern design.

products.name: Yene Business Oxford
products.description: Premium leather oxfords designed for business professionals. Handcrafted with genuine leather uppers and comfortable cushioned insoles for all-day wear.

products.name: Yene Hiking Boot
products.description: Rugged hiking boots built for challenging terrains. Features waterproof construction, superior grip outsole, and ankle support for your outdoor adventures.

products.name: Yene Summer Sandal
products.description: Comfortable and stylish sandals perfect for warm weather. Made with soft straps and cushioned footbeds for all-day comfort during summer adventures.

products.name: Yene Performance Runner
products.description: High-performance running shoes designed for marathons and serious runners. Features advanced energy return technology and lightweight construction.

products.name: Yene Classic Loafer
products.description: Elegant loafers crafted from premium materials for a timeless look. Perfect for business casual settings with comfortable cushioning for all-day wear.
